rules_text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.
{1}, Sacrifice Chains of Eternity: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
Unearth {2} [i]({2}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
